fields.help_text: Default directory where you store your projects.
fields.name: projects_directory

fields.help_text: Path to execute a terminal on your local system. Use "#s" to indicate where to put editor command (for example, xterm -e "#s").
fields.name: terminal_path

fields.help_text: Path to your favourite text editor on your local system. Use open if you're on a Mac.
fields.name: editor_path
